WorkItem.ClosedComment: 3 days no reply from OP, lots of fixes and 2 version since then. If its still an issue for you OP, please reopen.Lokmar, that is a separate issue we've also fixed
WorkItem.Description:
I'm having issues running this in every browser on my laptop and on the installed version. The problem is the same regardless of what I do, the windows goes completely white and everything disappears. The right click menu does pop-up so I'm assuming this isn't a Silverlight crash.
 
No matter what I do this happens. If I leave the app alone once it loads this doesn't happen, just when I try to do something. It gives no errors, popups or warnings, etc.
 
Im running Silverlight 4.0.50917.0, Application storage quota is set at 32mb and showing current as 4.5mb.
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Application stops working after a few seconds, shows only a white screen

Comments.Message:
1) What model are you coming in to when it goes white?
2) Did you use Rawr3 previously (meaning you would need to delete the old cache files)?

I've seen this (screen going white) in the moonkin model when I press the reforge button on an item to try to change how it's being reforged.  For instance, if the item is currently reforged from mastery->crit, I can press the button and see a list of available reforges but if the current reforge is hit->spirit (created by the optimizer), then when I press the reforge button the screen goes white.
